original_text:
Golden Knight
Golden Knight, slot machine prodotta dalla software house High 5 Games, propone un tema che non è ancora stato molto sfruttato, ossia quello medioevale.
La storia si svolge appunto nel Medioevo e i protagonisti sono quelli dell’iconografia classica Medievale, con il cavaliere senza macchina e senza paura, la bella principessa che attende solo di essere salvata, un tripudio di spade lucenti, un feroce drago sputafuoco e gli immancabili cavalli.
La schermata iniziale riproduce il volto di un cavaliere belloccio (pare più un principe azzurro di Cenerentola) che brandisce una spada, mentre la griglia di gioco è collocata in un paesaggio campestre, con dei castelli all’orizzonte e i rulli posti semplicemente dentro una griglia dorata.
Il compartimento grafico di Golden Knight non è niente di eccezionale, mancano sia delle animazioni tridimensionali che gli effetti speciali, ma nonostante le linee siano così asciutte lo troviamo molto ben curato, ideale per coloro che non amano distrarsi troppo con le immagini ma che puntano tutto sul gioco.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Golden Knight è una slot machine con una griglia di gioco strutturata in maniera tradizionale, con cinque rulli, quattro righe e 40 linee di pagamento.
Si vince quando si ottengono delle combinazioni di simboli identici su rulli adiacenti a partire da sinistra verso destra. Molto interessante è il range di scommesse offerto da Golden Knight, se la puntata inferiore è pari a solo 1 centesimo per linea, per un totale di 40 centesimi, quella massima arriva alla strabiliante cifra di 800 €, interessante per i giocatori che amano sentire il brivido dell’adrenalina le scommesse al cardiopalma!
Nota dolente di questa slot è il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP), che si attesta su uno scadentissimo 95%, al di sotto della media e davvero poco per un gioco in cui si possono investire fino a 800 €.
Simboli e funzionalità di Golden Knight
I simboli che si alternano sui rulli di Golden Knight sono sia tematici che non e, come sempre nei giochi di slot, sono quelli tematici ad avere il valore maggiore.
I simboli che invece pagano meno sono rappresentati dai numeri e dalle lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco, in questo caso dal 9 all’Asso. Per ottenere delle vincite più alte bisogna sperare che compaiano la principessa, il cavallo e il drago sputafuoco.
È presente un simbolo Wild, identificato semplicemente dalla scritta corrispondente, che ha solo funzione di jolly e aiuta a completare le combinazioni per ottenere una vincita.
Abbiamo anche uno Scatter, rappresentato dalla scritta Free Games, che sblocca la funzione Free Spins quando appare sui tre rulli centrali: si parte con 7 giri gratuiti che possono essere riattivati fino a un massimo di 98.
Da segnalare infine la funzione speciale Scatter Bucks, che si può attivare giocando su tutte le quaranta linee più le altre quaranta dei giri gratuiti.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Knight

Golden Knight is a slot game produced by High 5 Games with a medieval theme that has yet to be explored. The story takes place during the Middle Ages, and the characters are those of classical medieval iconography, including a fearless knight, a beautiful princess waiting to be rescued, an array of shiny swords, a fire-breathing dragon, and, of course, horses.

The initial screen portrays a handsome knight (resembling more of a prince charming from Cinderella) brandishing a sword, while the game grid is placed in a rural landscape, with castles in the horizon and the reels placed simply within a golden grid. 

The graphical aspect of Golden Knight is nothing spectacular, lacking three-dimensional animations and special effects. Nevertheless, it is well-maintained, making it ideal for those experienced gamers looking to focus purely on the game without distractions from flashy imagery. 

Main features of the slot

Golden Knight is a slot game with a traditional game grid structure consisting of five reels, four rows, and 40 pay lines. Players win by obtaining combinations of identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from the left to the right. The range of betting options offered by Golden Knight is one of its most interesting features. Although the minimum bet is a mere 1 cent per line, totaling to 40 cents, the maximum bet goes up to a breathtaking 800€, perfect for gamers looking to get their heart pumping with thrilling high-stakes bets.

Unfortunately, the downside to this slot game is its return to player rate (RTP), which stands at a meager 95%, below average and quite low for a game where you can invest up to 800€.

Symbols and functionalities of Golden Knight

The symbols on the reels of Golden Knight include both thematic and non-themed symbols, with the thematic ones having the highest value, as is customary in slot games. The lower-paying symbols are represented by the numbers and letters corresponding to playing cards, ranging from 9 to Ace. To obtain higher winnings, players need to hope that the princess, horse, and fire-breathing dragon appear on the reels. 

There is a Wild symbol identified simply by the corresponding label, which serves as a wild card and helps complete winning combinations to obtain a payout. Additionally, there is a Scatter symbol represented by the label 'Free Games,' which unlocks the Free Spins function when it appears on the three central reels. Players begin with 7 free spins and can reactivate them up to a maximum of 98. Finally, there is the special Scatter Bucks feature, which can be activated by playing on all 40 pay lines in conjunction with the 40 pay lines of the free spins. 

All in all, Golden Knight is a medieval-themed slot game that could be exciting for experienced gamblers, with its ability to allow high-stakes betting and its potentially thrilling features.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Knight,
The slot machine produced by High 5 Games brings a fresh take to the medieval theme. The game is set in the Middle Ages, with classic medieval characters that include a fearless knight, a beautiful princess waiting to be rescued, shiny swords, a fierce fire-breathing dragon, and trusty horses.
The initial screen features a handsome knight (resembling Cinderella's prince) brandishing a sword while the game reels are set against a scenic countryside with castles on the horizon. The graphics are simple yet well-designed and perfect for experienced gamblers who prefer focusing on the gameplay rather than fancy graphics and animations.
Main features of the game:
Golden Knight is a traditional 5-reel, 40-payline slot machine. Wins are achieved by matching identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right. Excitingly, the game offers a wide range of betting options, starting from a mere 1 cent per line to a whopping €800 per spin, making it an excellent game for thrill-seeking gamblers who crave high-stakes action!
One downside of Golden Knight is its low return to player (RTP) ratio at only 95%, below-average for this type of game and not recommended for players investing up to €800.
Symbols and features of Golden Knight:
Symbols featured on the reels include thematic and non-thematic ones, with the thematic ones having higher values. Lower-valued symbols include card numbers and letters from 9 to Ace, while higher-value ones include the princess, horse, and fire-breathing dragon. The game also features a Wild symbol, represented by its name, which acts as the joker card and helps complete winning combinations.
Additionally, there is a Scatter symbol represented by the Free Games sign, which unlocks the Free Spins feature when appearing on the central reels. Players start with seven free spins, with the possibility of re-triggering up to 98 more rounds. Furthermore, the game features the special Scatter Bucks function, which can be triggered by playing all the 40 lines plus the additional 40 included in the free spins. 
Experience the thrilling world of the Middle Ages and try your luck with Golden Knight!

All in all, Golden Knight is a medieval-themed slot game that could be exciting for experienced gamblers, with its ability to allow high-stakes betting and its potentially thrilling features.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Golden Knight".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay mechanics and structure
Betting options and accessibility
Free Spins function and Scatter Bucks feature
Graphics and visual effects
Return to Player (RTP) percentage

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Golden Knight

Golden Knight is a slot game produced by High 5 Games with a medieval theme that has yet to be explored. The story takes place during the Middle Ages, and the characters are those of classical medieval iconography, including a fearless knight, a beautiful princess waiting to be rescued, an array of shiny swords, a fire-breathing dragon, and, of course, horses.

The initial screen portrays a handsome knight (resembling more of a prince charming from Cinderella) brandishing a sword, while the game grid is placed in a rural landscape, with castles in the horizon and the reels placed simply within a golden grid. 

The graphical aspect of Golden Knight is nothing spectacular, lacking three-dimensional animations and special effects. Nevertheless, it is well-maintained, making it ideal for those experienced gamers looking to focus purely on the game without distractions from flashy imagery. 

Main features of the slot

Golden Knight is a slot game with a traditional game grid structure consisting of five reels, four rows, and 40 pay lines. Players win by obtaining combinations of identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from the left to the right. The range of betting options offered by Golden Knight is one of its most interesting features. Although the minimum bet is a mere 1 cent per line, totaling to 40 cents, the maximum bet goes up to a breathtaking 800€, perfect for gamers looking to get their heart pumping with thrilling high-stakes bets.

Unfortunately, the downside to this slot game is its return to player rate (RTP), which stands at a meager 95%, below average and quite low for a game where you can invest up to 800€.

Symbols and functionalities of Golden Knight

The symbols on the reels of Golden Knight include both thematic and non-themed symbols, with the thematic ones having the highest value, as is customary in slot games. The lower-paying symbols are represented by the numbers and letters corresponding to playing cards, ranging from 9 to Ace. To obtain higher winnings, players need to hope that the princess, horse, and fire-breathing dragon appear on the reels. 

There is a Wild symbol identified simply by the corresponding label, which serves as a wild card and helps complete winning combinations to obtain a payout. Additionally, there is a Scatter symbol represented by the label 'Free Games,' which unlocks the Free Spins function when it appears on the three central reels. Players begin with 7 free spins and can reactivate them up to a maximum of 98. Finally, there is the special Scatter Bucks feature, which can be activated by playing on all 40 pay lines in conjunction with the 40 pay lines of the free spins. 

All in all, Golden Knight is a medieval-themed slot game that could be exciting for experienced gamblers, with its ability to allow high-stakes betting and its potentially thrilling features.

If you’re looking for a slot game that’s straightforward yet fun, Golden Knight is definitely worth checking out. Just remember, if you want to win big, you’ll need more than just the luck of the draw – but if the knight in shining armor is on your side, anything is possible!

response.headline: Unleash the Excitement with Special Features and Bonus Rounds
response.content:
Get ready to be thrilled with the fantastic special features of Golden Knight slot game. This slot game has the perfect combination of exciting features and huge payouts that make it stand out from the rest. The game features the wild symbol, which is labelled just “wild.” The symbol can replace other symbols to complete a winning combination. You'd better pay close attention and keep your fingers crossed to get lucky with this wild symbol.

Another exciting feature of Golden Knight is the 'Free Games' scatter symbol. When this symbol appears on the central three reels, it activates the Free Spins feature. This means that you can enjoy up to seven free spins. That’s just the start! You can reactivate this feature and earn up to 98 free spins! It’s like Christmas came early when the free spins are triggered.

But that’s not all! Golden Knight really sets itself apart from the pack with a unique feature that you won’t find anywhere else – the Scatter Bucks feature. To activate it, you need to play on all 40 pay lines and the 40 pay lines of the free spins. This fantastic feature will add additional value to your scatter symbols, giving you a chance to huge payouts. The Scatter Bucks feature doesn’t trigger every time, but when it happens, you can rest assured that you will get the chance to win big.

Overall, Golden Knight is a fantastic slot game that stands out from the crowd. The special features are unique, thrilling, and potentially hugely rewarding. Give it a spin today, and you might just be the next lucky winner to take home the crown jewel of fortunes!

Graphics and visual effects

Golden Knight has a medieval theme with a golden grid background and includes classical medieval icons such as knights, princesses, horses, swords, and dragons. Although there may be a lack of visual effects and three-dimensional animations, the graphics are well-maintained and suitable for players who want to stay focused on the game without being overwhelmed by flashy imagery.

Return to Player (RTP) percentage

Unfortunately, the RTP percentage in Golden Knight is only 95%, which is below average, and may not be attractive to many players. This low percentage is surprising given the up to 800€ maximum bet allowed in the game.

Review: Golden Knight

Golden Knight is a slot game produced by High 5 Games with a medieval theme that has yet to be explored. The story takes place during the Middle Ages, and the characters are those of classical medieval iconography, including a fearless knight, a beautiful princess waiting to be rescued, an array of shiny swords, a fire-breathing dragon, and, of course, horses.

The initial screen portrays a handsome knight (resembling more of a prince charming from Cinderella) brandishing a sword, while the game grid is placed in a rural landscape, with castles in the horizon and the reels placed simply within a golden grid. 

The graphical aspect of Golden Knight is nothing spectacular, lacking three-dimensional animations and special effects. Nevertheless, it is well-maintained, making it ideal for those experienced gamers looking to focus purely on the game without distractions from flashy imagery. 

Main features of the slot

Golden Knight is a slot game with a traditional game grid structure consisting of five reels, four rows, and 40 pay lines. Players win by obtaining combinations of identical symbols on adjacent reels, starting from the left to the right. The range of betting options offered by Golden Knight is one of its most interesting features. Although the minimum bet is a mere 1 cent per line, totaling to 40 cents, the maximum bet goes up to a breathtaking 800€, perfect for gamers looking to get their heart pumping with thrilling high-stakes bets.

Unfortunately, the downside to this slot game is its return to player rate (RTP), which stands at a meager 95%, below average and quite low for a game where you can invest up to 800€.

Symbols and functionalities of Golden Knight

The symbols on the reels of Golden Knight include both thematic and non-themed symbols, with the thematic ones having the highest value, as is customary in slot games. The lower-paying symbols are represented by the numbers and letters corresponding to playing cards, ranging from 9 to Ace. To obtain higher winnings, players need to hope that the princess, horse, and fire-breathing dragon appear on the reels. 

There is a Wild symbol identified simply by the corresponding label, which serves as a wild card and helps complete winning combinations to obtain a payout. Additionally, there is a Scatter symbol represented by the label 'Free Games,' which unlocks the Free Spins function when it appears on the three central reels. Players begin with 7 free spins and can reactivate them up to a maximum of 98. Finally, there is the special Scatter Bucks feature, which can be activated by playing on all 40 pay lines in conjunction with the 40 pay lines of the free spins. 

All in all, Golden Knight is a medieval-themed slot game that could be exciting for experienced gamblers, with its ability to allow high-stakes betting and its potentially thrilling features.
